mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pay ( accommodation_id, id, reservation_id, checkin_date, checkout_date, guest_count, total_price, final_price, coupon_id ) VALUES ( #{accommodation_id}, #{id}, #{reservation_id}, #{checkin_date}, #{checkout_date}, #{guest_count}, #{total_price}, #{final_price}, #{coupon_id} )
mapper.select: select * from pay order by reservation_id desc

SELECT p.reservation_id, p.id, p.accommodation_id, a.accommodation_name, p.checkin_date, p.checkout_date, p.guest_count, p.total_price, p.final_price, p.coupon_id FROM pay p JOIN accommodation a ON p.accommodation_id = a.accommodation_id WHERE p.id = #{loginId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pay WHERE accommodation_id = #{accommodation_id} AND ( (checkin_date < #{checkout_date} AND checkout_date > #{checkin_date}) )
